title: Something ends, something begins.
author: SecCodeSmith (Jakub)
content:
# I created this blog as the start of building my professional image, 
 a place to document my projects and share my experiences. It's also a personal challenge for me. 
 I am about to finish my studies and step into a new chapter of my professional life. 
 On this blog, I will describe my projects and the lessons I've learned along the way. 
 My first project will be creating my own website, featuring a blog, information about me, and descriptions of my work. 
 See you soon!
